name: Dodge and eat
description:
It is a small arcade score-chaser game , the goal is to beat your previous score and unlock the next level.

Game play

You control a small ball chasing for green coins to get score. 

- press "SPACE" key to change the color, you can eat obstacles  which have the same color as you.

- press  "Ctrl"  key  to shield yourself, collect more yellow obstacles to gain more yellow energy which can convert to shield.
